sketches.title: Sacred Symmetry
sketches.desc: A hypnotic convergence of art and spirit, this mandala blooms from the center like a cosmic lotus. It serves as a visual meditation, where every petal and curve signifies the harmonious unfolding of life's infinite possibilities, inviting the viewer into a state of deep mindfulness.

sketches.title: Uma Maheshwara
sketches.desc: Depicting the serene embrace of Shiva and Parvati, this intricate stippling artwork captures the essence of Uma-Maheshvara. Seated in eternal harmony at the Hoysaleshwar Temple, the couple represents the perfect balance of masculine and feminine energies (Purusha and Prakriti).

sketches.title: Vighnaharta
sketches.desc: Ganapati, the beloved elephant-headed god, is revered as the remover of obstacles, clearing paths with grace and strength. His very name, Vighnaharta, resonates as a promise of protection and guidance.

sketches.title: Wrath of the protector
sketches.desc: Narasimha, fierce and majestic in his half-human, half-lion form, unleashes divine judgment upon the Rakshasa Hiranyakashipu. A scene of celestial justice carved in stone at the Chennakeshava Temple, Belur, India.

sketches.title: Wheel of time
sketches.desc: A magnificent wheel at the Konark Sun Temple, a tribute to the source of all life, the supreme soul who bestows light and warmth upon the world. Each spoke and carving tells the story of existence, a timeless ode to the rhythms of creation and the divine cycle of being.

sketches.title: The cosmic dance
sketches.alt: The cosmic dance of the destroyer
sketches.desc: Shiva, the great destroyer, moves in his divine rhythm, each step a wave of destruction heralding the world's end. At the Kedareshwara Temple in Halebidu, India, this dance is eternal, capturing the powerful cycle of creation and dissolution in the universe.

sketches.title: Muse of Melodies
sketches.desc: She plays the veena with serene devotion, embodying Saraswati, the goddess of wisdom and the arts. Her music flows like a river of knowledge and creativity, inspiring all who hear it with its tranquil beauty and timeless grace.
